comment._content: Man, what a jaw on this fellow.  He looks tough and determined.

comment.author: 57669468@N00
comment._content: He played 3rd, 2nd base and OF for St. Louis Browns and NY Yankees.

comment.author: 74604045@N00
comment._content: I love seeing the evolution of baseball uniforms. Great photograph.

comment.author: 61276221@N00
comment._content:
i got to shoot a local game last week with vintage (1870 or so) uniforms.. wool, in a missouri summer.... 
these guys were GAME.

comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Well, the first six teams I played for all issued wool uniforms....The major leagues wore wool uniforms until the late fifties.  Wool wasn't too bad as long as you wore a long sleeve or 3/4 sleeve cotton shirt under and wore  sliding pads and boxers underneath.  We all made it some way.
